amendment.description: Amendment sought to direct that any determination of prevailing wage pursuant to this Act, shall be conducted by the Secretary of Labor using surveys carried out by the Bureau that use proper random statistical sampling techniques.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 115-217 to direct that any determination of prevailing wage pursuant to this Act, shall be conducted by the Secretary of Labor using surveys carried out by the Bureau that use proper random statistical sampling techniques.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A021) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 242 (Roll no. 370).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A021) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 242 (Roll no. 370).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A021) offered by Mr. Gosar.
